tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I had consulted Nakul sir for my right clavicle fracture. Sir has been very patient to explain the issue, suggested a treatment plan and helped to expedite the surgery schedule. Nakul sir has been very helpful throughout the treatment process and I had a very positive experience consulting him. My surgery was performed by Nakul sir and it ended successfully. I have recovered well and am looking forward to removing the implant soon.I would recommend him to all my friends/family for his friendliness. He is approachable for any issues all the time. Thanks sir for your service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ***** ** *** **** ** *** ****** Was very scared about my recovery due to my weight issues. But he made the journey easy for me. Had to visit for dressing every alternate day. The nursing staff at kasper did an amazing job. All of them are highly professional and well behaved.

Dr. Nakul is very humble. He understands the route cause of Pain . After examination he will try to explain about the problematic area very precisely. 
Very helpful and understanding nature.The clinic staff are very courteous and maintains it like 5star. **** ****** ****** ** **********.
Thank you Doctor ðŸ˜Š

My son aged 11 years had sprained both his hands. Dr.Nakul sir has treated him with expertise and compassion. We are greatly indebted to the doctor for the skilful treatment and guidance which made my son recover faster. We can never thank you enough doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: We went to the doctor for a badly sprained ankle injury. He did not look at the foot and just asked for an X-RAY. Wasn't very clear about what the issue was, and didn't really communicate very well. We had to seek a second opinion.

Visited for foot fracture. The fiber cast was made thicker and heavy on the ankle joint side and was told to walk on heels. I told him it's uncomfortable to walk and I already have ankle stiffness. He said it is intentional this way and it will be fine after few days. But I felt extreme discomfort and pain in my ankle and calf due to this, especially for first 2 weeks. Now the cast is removed but this has caused extreme stiffness, even after taking many physiotherapy sessions. ** *************** **** **** *** **** ** *** ******** ** ** ******* ** *** ****** *** ** ** *** *******. This caused extreme discomfort and pain when the cast was on, and after removal of cast as well. It is almost a month now after removal of a cast and still I can't do a simple calf raise without feeling discomfort and stretchy feeling in my whole foot. The experience of cast for 4 weeks was hard and painful, *** *** ***** **** ******* *** **** **** **********. Doctor is friendly and answers all your questions but treatment is not satisfactory. Also, I got this cast done at Kasper clinic, and it is extremely expensive. Paid around 8k for the cast.

i have visited Dr. Nakul for my disc bulge.  i was having lot of worries on my recovery and my spinal issues. doctor is very humble and boost your confidence. he clears all my doubts about 1hr.* *** ** **** *** * ***** *** ** * **** ******* Believe me , more than medicine our confidence should help us to recover fast.  This doctor gave me tat.. He clearly tells wat we need to correct and focus. thanks so much doctorThanks Deepa

Visited Doctor for my parents knee pain. He is very knowledgeable and very well behaved. Spent 20min with us. Understood the problem very well and gave lot of moral support. Thankyou doctor for being so empathetic. Clinic is very well maintained. Bench mark service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: A very good doctor. Got an ACL surgery done. Explains the problem and extremely helpful and supportive throughout.

Took my mother for her knee pain, very happy to see her pain free face , Dr has done excellent treatment knee injection, now after two injections she is able to walk and sit down without pain. Highly recommended Dr and Kasper clinic for their care

review: Got my infected ingrown nail removed surgically by doctor after a slight injury to my foot. Very clean clinic with high standards of treatment. Reasonable pricing . As the same procedure would cost me 5digits in a big hospital. The X-ray team and nursing were very helpful. Kavya from reception was very guiding. Had a family clinic kind of experience.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Suffered with severe pain for almost a month post our trip. Consulted Dr.nakul through neighbours reference. Dr has prescribed basic medication , hot compresses and exercises. The pain gradually disappeared and now Iâ€™m able sit and sleep peacefully. 
The physiotherapist in Kasper saddam is also very good.

He explained the situation and condition of my mother and explained about the Treatment . The staff are also very humble.My mother is recovering very quickly with the treatment . She was able to walk normally within 2 months.
Thank you so much sir.

consulted dr.nakul sir for my wifeâ€™s lower back problem. From the time of delivery she has severe back pain which kept getting worse no matter how many treatments and doctors we visited. After 3months of treatment from dr.nakul and Physiotherapy at Kasper her back pin is completely disappeared. ********* ********** Highly recommend.

Visited Dr nakul sir for  my lower back and neck pain.  
I have visited many Orthopaedetician for past 5years. But after visiting doctors treatment  my pain has reduce and I feel so much free on my back and neck the physiotherapy session at Kasper help heal faster overall a very fantastic experience.  Keep it up Kasper.
